books.author: by Ta-Nehisi Coates
books.description: A meditation on race in America as well as a personal story by the Atlantic's national correspondent; a National Book Award winner.
books.name: BETWEEN THE WORLD AND ME

books.author: by Michael Lewis
books.description: The people who saw the real estate crash coming and made billions from their foresight. Originally published in 2010 and now a movie.
books.name: THE BIG SHORT

books.author: by Mitchell Zuckoff with members of the Annex Security Team
books.description: Six C.I.A. contract employees discuss their experience during the attack on the State Department compound and the C.I.A. station called the “annex” in Benghazi in 2012.
books.name: 13 HOURS

books.author: by Brian Kilmeade and Don Yaeger
books.description: The war against the Barbary pirates in 1801.
books.name: THOMAS JEFFERSON AND THE TRIPOLI PIRATES

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the events surrounding the attempted assassination of President Reagan in 1981.
books.name: KILLING REAGAN

books.author: by The Countess of Carnarvon
books.description: The inspiration and setting for the show on PBS. Originally published in 2011.
books.name: LADY ALMINA AND THE REAL DOWNTON ABBEY

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Pat Conroy
books.description: The author describes a year he spent teaching in a two-room schoolhouse on a remote island off South Carolina. Originally published in 1972.
books.name: THE WATER IS WIDE

books.author: by Atul Gawande
books.description: The surgeon and New Yorker writer considers how doctors fail patients at the end of life, and how they can do better.
books.name: BEING MORTAL

books.author: by Malala Yousafzai with Christina Lamb
books.description: The experience of the Pakistani girl who advocated for women’s education and was shot by the Taliban.
books.name: I AM MALALA

books.author: by  Mark Bowden
books.description: The bloody battle between American forces and Somali street fighters in 1993. Originally published in 1999.
books.name: BLACK HAWK DOWN

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: The last voyage of the Lusitania, the passenger liner sunk by a German torpedo in 1915; by the author of “The Devil in the White City.”
books.name: DEAD WAKE

books.author: by Amy Poehler
books.description: A humorous miscellany from the comedian and actress.
books.name: YES PLEASE

books.author: by Aziz Ansari with Eric Klinenberg
books.description: The comedian enlists a sociologist to help him understand today’s dating scene.
books.name: MODERN ROMANCE

books.author: by David McCullough
books.description: The story of the bicycle mechanics from Ohio who ushered in the age of flight.
books.name: THE WRIGHT BROTHERS
